Characters.png" src="https://img-archero-2.game-vault.net/thumb/3/36/Characters.png/200px-Characters.png" decoding="async" loading="lazy" width="200" height="338" class="thumbimage" srcset="https://img-archero-2.game-vault.net/thumb/3/36/Characters.png/300px-Characters.png 1.5x, https://img-archero-2.game-vault.net/thumb/3/36/Characters.png/400px-Characters.png 2x" data-file-width="506" data-file-height="856">
characters are your playable heroes, each offering unique abilities that shape your gameplay experience. You can find and manage them within the

Characters Tab. Unlocking new characters requires obtaining 50 of their specific shards, which are acquired through in-game quests and activities, or by purchasing them from the shop and during special events.

keywords: Characters.png" src="https://img-archero-2.game-vault.net/thumb/3/36/Characters.png/24px-Characters.png" decoding="async" loading="lazy" width="24" height="41" class="mr-35" srcset="https://img-archero-2.game-vault.net/thumb/3/36/Characters.png/36px-Characters.png 1.5x, https://img-archero-2.game-vault.net/thumb/3/36/Characters.png/48px-Characters.png 2x" data-file-width="506" data-file-height="856">
Rune Ruin pulls are broken down by chest type and then each then has its own individual break down for the rune contained i.e
rune is rarer and has half the probability of other blessing runes (0.15% pull rate in a Sturdy Chest, 0.30% pull rate for other blessing rune)

Rune Chest Rusty.png" src="https://img-archero-2.game-vault.net/thumb/3/38/Rune_Chest_Rusty.png/24px-Rune_Chest_Rusty.png" decoding="async" loading="lazy" width="24" height="17" class="mr-35" srcset="https://img-archero-2.game-vault.net/thumb/3/38/Rune_Chest_Rusty.png/36px-Rune_Chest_Rusty.png 1.5x, https://img-archero-2.game-vault.net/thumb/3/38/Rune_Chest_Rusty.png/48px-Rune_Chest_Rusty.png 2x" data-file-width="620" data-file-height="430">

Rune Chest Sturdy.png" src="https://img-archero-2.game-vault.net/thumb/6/61/Rune_Chest_Sturdy.png/24px-Rune_Chest_Sturdy.png" decoding="async" loading="lazy" width="24" height="17" class="mr-35" srcset="https://img-archero-2.game-vault.net/thumb/6/61/Rune_Chest_Sturdy.png/36px-Rune_Chest_Sturdy.png 1.5x, https://img-archero-2.game-vault.net/thumb/6/61/Rune_Chest_Sturdy.png/48px-Rune_Chest_Sturdy.png 2x" data-file-width="620" data-file-height="430">

Rune Chest Glorius.png" src="https://img-archero-2.game-vault.net/thumb/9/9d/Rune_Chest_Glorius.png/24px-Rune_Chest_Glorius.png" decoding="async" loading="lazy" width="24" height="17" class="mr-35" srcset="https://img-archero-2.game-vault.net/thumb/9/9d/Rune_Chest_Glorius.png/36px-Rune_Chest_Glorius.png 1.5x, https://img-archero-2.game-vault.net/thumb/9/9d/Rune_Chest_Glorius.png/48px-Rune_Chest_Glorius.png 2x" data-file-width="620" data-file-height="430">
rune loot pool. The pool cycles between elemental/circle, weapon/meteor, and sprite/strike.

Runes.png" src="https://img-archero-2.game-vault.net/thumb/9/9d/Runes.png/24px-Runes.png" decoding="async" loading="lazy" width="24" height="24" class="mr-35" srcset="https://img-archero-2.game-vault.net/thumb/9/9d/Runes.png/36px-Runes.png 1.5x, https://img-archero-2.game-vault.net/thumb/9/9d/Runes.png/48px-Runes.png 2x" data-file-width="200" data-file-height="200">
Gear or Artifacts. Below are the tables that show you the% chance you have of pulling that Gear/Artifact.

Gear (This does not include the pity pull)
For example if you were to use a Wish you will have 24% chance to pull an Epic Artifact Shard (This does not include the pity pull)
gear for every pull is 38.18% each time (not including the epic pity pull)
